languages.text: Как в великом тщании своем святой Когнаций, воитель и премудрый искусник, не хоронился в стенах либрариума, но смело ступал во тьму, дабы нести светоч в длани своей, и прочим заповедал сие. И отпечатки длани его запечатлены во многих мирах Простора Коронус, не на одном Фолстоуне.

And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.
languages.original_text: Как в великом тщании своем святой Когнаций, воитель и премудрый искусник, не хоронился в стенах либрариума, но смело ступал во тьму, дабы нести светоч в длани своей, и прочим заповедал сие. И отпечатки длани его запечатлены во многих мирах Простора Коронус, не на одном Фолстоуне.

traits.locale_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

During a prayer, there came to him a revelation that Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same.

And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

While deep in prayer, there came to him a revelation that Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same.

And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

languages.text: Y san Cognatius fue un gran emprendedor, un guerrero y un sabio artífice. Nunca se refugió tras los muros de su bibliotecarium, sino que se adentró valientemente en la oscuridad llevando una luz en la palma de la mano, y exhortó a otros a seguir su ejemplo. Rocainmunda es solo uno de los muchos mundos de la Extensión de Koronus que llevan su marca.
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: En lo más profundo de sus oraciones le llegó la revelación de que san Cognatius fue un gran emprendedor, un guerrero y un sabio artífice. Este prócer nunca se refugió tras los muros de su bibliotecarium, sino que se adentró valientemente en la oscuridad llevando una luz en la palma de la mano. Exhortó a otros a seguir su ejemplo.

languages.text: 当他沉浸在祈祷中时，他得到了启示。在启示中，他看到了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯。这位充满热忱与智慧的圣徒、战士与工匠从不会畏缩地躲在档案库的高墙之后，而是会手握光明，勇敢地踏入黑暗之中，指挥其他人与他一同前行。这位勇士不仅仅来到了荒寂岩地，他的足迹还踏遍了科罗努斯扩区诸多其他世界。
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: 当他沉浸在祈祷中时，他得到了启示。在启示中，他看到了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯。这位充满热忱与智慧的圣徒、战士与工匠从不会畏缩地躲在智库的高墙之后，而是会手握光明，勇敢地踏入黑暗之中，指挥其他人与他一同前行。

languages.text: そして大いなる努力の人であり、戦士であり、賢明な職人である聖コグナティウスは、怯えて書庫の壁の後ろに隠れることはせず、手のひらに光を携えて、勇ましく暗闇へと足を踏み入れる。他の者にも同じようにしろと命じた。今ではファウルストーンだけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスの他の惑星にもその痕跡が残っている。
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: そして大いなる努力の人であり、戦士であり、賢明な職人である聖セファスは、怯えて書庫の壁の後ろに隠れることはせず、手のひらに光を携えて、勇ましく暗闇へと足を踏み入れる。他の者にも同じようにしろと命じた。今ではファウルストーンだけでなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスの他の惑星にもその痕跡が残っている。

languages.text: Und Sankt Cognatius, ein Mann der großen Unternehmungen, ein Krieger und weiser Erbauer, sich niemals in den Mauern eines Librariums versteckt hatte, sondern mutig in die Dunkelheit gegangen war, ein Licht in der Hand, und anderen stets befohlen hatte, es ihm gleichzutun. Und nicht nur Foulstone, sondern viele weitere Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung tragen heute seinen Stempel.
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: Tief im Gebet versunken kam ihm die Erkenntnis, dass St. Cognatius, ein Mann der großen Unternehmungen, ein Krieger und weiser Erbauer, sich niemals in den Mauern eines Librariums versteckt hatte, sondern mutig in die Dunkelheit gegangen war, ein Licht in der Hand, und anderen stets befohlen hatte, es ihm gleichzutun.

languages.text: Et Saint Cognatius, un homme d'action, un guerrier et un artificier avisé, ne s'est jamais retranché derrière les murs d'un librarium. Au contraire, il s'est aventuré dans les ténèbres où, portant haut la lumière dans la paume de sa main, il a ordonné aux autres de le suivre. Et ainsi, non seulement Rochepeste, mais aussi de nombreux autres mondes des Étendues de Koronus sont marqués de son empreinte.
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: Alors qu'il est plongé dans la prière, il se souvient que Saint Cognatius, un homme d'action, un guerrier et un artificier avisé, ne s'est jamais retranché derrière les murs d'un librarium. Au contraire, il s'est aventuré dans les ténèbres où, portant haut la lumière dans la paume de sa main, il a ordonné aux autres de le suivre.

languages.text: Büyük başarılara imza atmış bir savaşçı ve bilge bir zanaatkâr olan Aziz Cognatius, asla bir libraryumun duvarları arkasına sinmezdi. Aksine yiğitçe karanlığa atılır, ışığı avucunun içinde taşır ve diğerlerine de aynısını yapmayı emrederdi. Yalnızca Menfurtaş değil, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki diğer birçok dünya da bunun etkisini görürdü.
languages.original_text: And Saint Cognatius, a man of great endeavours, a warrior and a wise artificer, never cowered behind the walls of a librarium, but stepped bravely into the darkness, carrying light in the palm of his hand; and he commanded others to do the same. And not only Foulstone but many other worlds of the Koronus Expanse bear its imprint.

traits.locale_text: Büyük başarılara imza atmış bir savaşçı ve bilge bir zanaatkâr olan Aziz Cognatius, asla bir libraryumun duvarları arkasına sinmezdi. Aksine yiğitçe karanlığa atılır, ışığı avucunun içinde taşır ve diğerlerine de aynısını yapmayı emrederdi. Yalnızca Menfurtaş değil, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki diğer birçok dünya da bunun etkisini görürdü.
